src_original: ete bāhyā iti boddhavyāḥ /  ke ca sthāpitāḥ /  rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmadhātavaḥ /
adhy ātmānam adhyātmam /  adhyātmam evādhyātmikam /
ātmany asati katham ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā bhavati /
na hi śīle 'saty adhiśīlaṃ śikṣā yujyate /
ahaṅkārasanniśritatvāc cittam ātmety upacaryate /
rūpaskandhānantaraṃ vedanāskandhanirdeśāvasaras tadanantaram uddiṣṭatvād iti praśnaḥ -- vedanā katameti /  trividho 'nubhava iti nirdeśaḥ /
anubhūtir anubhavo vastuno hlādaparitāpatadubhayākāravinirmuktasvarū[p. 25]pasākṣātkaraṇaḥ /  atha vā hlādaparitāpobhayākāravinirmuktaṃ vastusvarūpam anubhavatīty anubhavaḥ /
sa ca svabhāvabhedāt trividhaḥ ,
vedanānubhavaḥ sparśasyety ācāryasaṅghabhadraḥ /
iṣṭāniṣṭobhayaviparītānāṃ sparśānām anubhavaḥ sā vedanā /
tathā coktam -- sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhā vedanetivistaraḥ /
yadi ca viṣayānubhavo vedanā syāt ,  ekālambanebhyo 'sya ko viśeṣaḥ syāt /
yena sparśānubhavo vedaneti vyavasthāpyate /
evaṃ tarhi sañjñādhimokṣasmṛtiprajñādīnām ālambanadvārako vedanāvat svabhāvo na vaktavyaḥ /
athaikālambanebhyo nimittodgrahaṇādibhiḥ sañjñādīnāṃ viśeṣa ucyate vedanāyā viṣayānubhavena kiṃ neṣyate /  sparśānubhavaś ca tatsamprayogaḥ kāraṇabhāvo vā parikalpyeta ,

kāyasya viṣaya iti bhūtānām api kāyaviṣayatvād upādāyarūpaprasaṅga ity ata āha -- mahābhūtāni sthāpayitveti /  spraṣṭavyaikadeśapradarśanārtham āha -- ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvam ityādi /  nanu ca kāyendriyeṇa spṛśyata iti ślakṣṇatvādi spraṣṭavyam ucyate /  yac ca yena spṛśyate niyogāt tad api tat spṛśatīti kāyendriye 'pi sparśatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
tasmād viṣayendriyayor nirantarotpattau yadāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ [p. 18] viṣayamupalabhate tena sa viṣayaḥ spṛṣṭa ity upacaryate na tu viṣayeṇa vijñānāśrayaḥ
ata eva kāyendriyeṇa bhūtāny eva spṛśyanta ity upacaryate ,
na tadāśritā rūpādayaḥ ,  kāyavijñānenāgrahaṇāt /
puṣpādiṣu ca varṇādyupaghātas tadāśrayopaghātāt ,  na kāyasaṃsparśād iti /  varṇādyāśrayasyāpi kāyenāspṛṣṭasya katham upaghāta iti /
na paramārthaḥ /  ślakṣṇatvaṃ mṛdv aparūṣam āliṅganakṣamam ity arthaḥ /
ślakṣṇam eva ślakṣṇatvam /
karkaśatvam iti karkam asyāstīti karkaśam ,
karkaśam eva karkaśatvam /
rūkṣaṃ paruṣam asukumāram ity arthaḥ /  guruḥsāndra ity arthaḥ /  gurv eva gurutvam /  yena bhāvās tulyante ,  avanamanti /
laghutvaṃ yena bhāvā nāvanamanti /  saṃsthānapṛthutve 'pi yasya sadbhāvāt sukham āhriyate /  tulāyā jaghanāvanatikāraṇam ity arthaḥ /
yadabhyāhatasyoṣṇābhilāṣo bhavati tac chītam /  nanu ca grīṣme śaradi ca saty api śīta uṣṇābhilāṣo na bhavati /
uṣṇābhilāṣasyānyathābhāvāt ,  śītam evoṣṇābhilāṣakṛd ity avadhāryate /
jighatsā bhojanābhilāṣakṛt /  pipāsā pānābhilāṣakṛt /
na hi caitasiko dharmaḥ kāyendriyaviṣayo 'stīti /
ataḥ kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtveha nirdeśo jighatsā pipāseti /
vāyudhātubhūyiṣṭho hi kaścit spraṣṭavyaviśeṣo jighatsāhetuḥ koṣṭha utpadyate /
sa jighatsākāraṇatvāj jighatsety uktaḥ /
anye 'pi mūrchābaladaurbalyādayaḥ spraṣṭavyaviśeṣā vidyante /  eteṣv evāntarbhutā iti pṛthag noktāḥ /  mūrchā ślakṣṇatvān na bhidyate /  balaṃ karkaśagurutvābhyām /
evam anye 'pispraṣṭavyaviśeṣā yathāsambhavam antarbhāvayitavyāḥ /
ślakṣṇatvādīnāṃ tv āśrayaviśeṣāt parasparato viśeṣaḥ /
aptejodhātūtsadatvācchlakṣṇatvam /  pṛthivīvāyudhātūtsadatvāt karkaśatvam /
pṛthivyabdhātūtsadatvād gurutvam /  tejovāyudhātūtsadatvāl laghutvam /
ata eva mṛtaśarīreṣv adhikaṃ gurutvam /
